A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The longest SW movie to date\, and the nearly the whole time I was wondering just how long it was going to take. Plodding pacing\, irrelevant subplots\, character assassination of Luke Skywalker\, and new characters that range between \"I can't stand them\" and \"I couldn't care less about them.\" I'd call this film a maggot infested pile of crap\, but that'd be unnecessarily disrespectful to maggot infested piles of crap.
